content.photo-caption: Two people from out team visited Bajrabarahi VDC in Makwanpur district on November 6, 2014 to meet the local farmers, teachers and farmers' coorperatives to discuss the possibility of mapping agriculture and food security related data.
After knowing about OpenStreetMap they were excited to map their VDC and show the world about the agricultural capacity of Bajrabarahi.
We discussed the feasibility of the mapping process in the VDC.
A local community consisting of Teachers, Farmers and Local youth was formed in order to coordinate the mapping work in the VDC.
Our agriculture consultant provided an overview of food security to all the attendees.
We showed them existing maps and how editing works in OpenStreetMap to encourage them for mapping.
They also explored OpenStreetMap in their mobile phones and were pumped up to map their village.
The volunteers went to field to collect map data using their mobile phones.
The volunteers quickly learned to map the data that they collected in the field with some help from the OSM Champions.
Volunteers traced Roads, POIs, Canals, Buildings using satellite imagery.
We talked with local farmers to learn about their farming methods and farming process in Bajrabarahi.
We also visited local farms and learned in practise how farming is done in Bajrabarahi.
Local farmers discussed and came up with a list of features they wanted to map.
With lot of discussion and brainstroming, our team came up with a way to represent these data in Openstreetmap.
This allowed the locals to start mapping their farms and major crops in Bajrabarahi.
We took the approach of involving local citizens to map crop pockets with the help of their local knowledge and satellite imagery.
The five days long hardwork and mapping resulted in a well detailed map of Bajrabarahi in OpenStreetMap.

content.whole:
The following names represent the local OSM community of Bajrabarahi who helped to make this project a success:

  • Mr. Dhruba Prasad Bidari - Manager of Small Farmer Cooperative Pvt. Ltd.
  • Mr. Rabindra Bidari - Accountant of Bajrabarahi H.S School
  • Mr. Kabi Luv Rai - Teacher of Sunaulo Secondary School
  • Mr. Rajen Shrestha
  • Mr. Krishna Bhatt
  • Mr. Fanindra Subedi - Kiwi Entrepreneur
  • Mr. Atma Ram Dahal - Teacher of Bajrabarahi H.S School
